titleInfo.title: The Consistency of Probabilistic Regresses. Some Implications for Epistemological Infinitism

mods.abstract: This note employs the recently established consistency theorem for infinite regresses of probabilistic justification (Herzberg in Stud Log 94(3):331-345, 2010) to address some of the better-known objections to epistemological infinitism. In addition, another proof for that consistency theorem is given; the new derivation no longer employs nonstandard analysis, but utilises the Daniell-Kolmogorov theorem.
